tool_description: FREE resources for checking VIN, getting the market value of your car, estimating the cost of ownership in US,  checking fuel economy, and more to come.
name: Car Utils
title: Car Utils

api_list.name: Estimate Ownership Cost
api_list.description: Estimate how much you will spend on the car with specified VIN for the next 5 years.

optional_parameters.name: mileage_year
optional_parameters.description: An estimate of many miles you will drive every year for the next 5 years. Defaults to 15000.

optional_parameters.name: mileage_start
optional_parameters.description: Start mileage of the car. If unspecified, an estimate will be used.

api_list.name: Estimate Market Value
api_list.description: Estimate market value of the car with specified VIN.

optional_parameters.name: mileage
optional_parameters.description: Current mileage of the car.  If unspecified, an estimate will be used.

api_list.name: Decode VIN
api_list.description: Decode VIN, get valuable information for the car you are interested in.

required_parameters.name: vin
required_parameters.description: [Vehicle identification number](https://www.autocheck.com/vehiclehistory/vin-basics). Incomplete VIN checking is supported.

api_list.name: Get fuel economy information
api_list.description: Get fuel economy information from the official U.S. government source.

required_parameters.name: model
required_parameters.description: The vehicle model. Use /models endpoint to get supported models for the specified make.

required_parameters.name: make
required_parameters.description: The vehicle make. Use /makes endpoint to get supported makes.

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Model year. Currently support model years from 1985 to 2023.

api_list.name: Get vehicle models
api_list.description: Get all supported vehicle models for specified make.

api_list.name: Get vehicle makes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-utils.p.rapidapi.com/makes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-utils.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://car-utils.p.rapidapi.com/makes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-utils.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
